status.title: Status
status.content: Currently seeking front-end related job opportunities, in any form

description.title: Analysis
description.content: Over an observation period of approximately one year, the Subject has exhibited a stable mechanism of Self-Iteration. Beyond the capacity for autonomous system construction, the Subject displays a proactive tendency to introduce new variables (emerging technologies) to optimize operational efficiency.

work.title: E-commerce Admin Interface
work.content: Contributed to the development of an e-commerce admin interface. Developed identity management pages and access control settings, and integrated relevant APIs. Maintained features based on client requirements and enhanced the overall system user experience.

work.title: Form Workflow Application
work.content: Responsible for the front-end development of a form workflow system. Established the base architecture using Vue.js, managed routing with Vue Router, and handled data state and field calculations using Pinia. Redesigned original forms and implemented filtering, submission, progress tracking, and result display features.

work.title: Q&A Platform
work.content: Developed a Q&A website. Built an intuitive question-and-answer flow using Vue.js and planned a streamlined web architecture and user interaction process.

items.title: AI Analysis/Full-Stack Developer(Dispatched to assist other companies in AI project development)

work.title: AI System Error Analysis
work.content: Organized and analyzed AI system error logs to diagnose the root causes of response anomalies, such as hallucinations or non-responsiveness.

work.title: Front-end Development
work.content: Developed a changelog feature and a statistics dashboard using Vue 3, Vue Router, and Vue Query, integrated with UI frameworks. Also assisted in optimizing page designs and enhancing user experience.

work.title: Back-end & Data Processing
work.content: Built backend APIs using Express.js and managed data with SQL and Sequelize to support the changelog feature. Optimized daily data processing workflows and utilized SQL to retrieve specific data for clients. Learned and implemented n8n automation, reducing daily processing time from 20 minutes to under 5 minutes, significantly boosting efficiency.

work.title: Data Analysis
work.content: Compiled comprehensive reports analyzing potential causes for data anomalies or low message volumes, and assisted clients in presenting these findings to management.

work.title: Web Crawler Maintenance
work.content: Assisted in configuring web crawler settings to ensure accurate data extraction. Collaborated with engineers to promptly resolve scraping issues.

items.title: Blog
items.description: A place to write personal reflections or records.

items.title: Book Horizon
items.description: A website for book reviews and social interaction.

items.title: ITHelp Keep Sharing Award 2023
items.description: Write a 30-day series of technical articles on the topic of JavaScript objects and the DOM.
